:orphan:

Booster
=======

**From:** `Sinara Open Hardware Project <https://github.com/sinara-hw/Booster>`_

**Class:** :py:class:`herosdevices.hardware.sinara.booster.Booster`


**Driver Quality Index:** alpha


Booster 8-channel RF Amplifier.

.. tabs::

      Bold arguments are mandatory.    .. tab:: Example JSON for BOSS
   
      The following JSON strings can be used to start a HERO device representation of             :py:class:`Booster <herosdevices.hardware.sinara.booster.Booster>` using             `BOSS <https://boss-eb4966.gitlab.io/>`_.
      
      
      .. code-block:: json
      
         {
             "_id": "my_Booster",
             "classname": "herosdevices.hardware.sinara.booster.Booster",
             "arguments": {
                 "device": "<class 'str'>",
                 "port": 5000,
                 "read_timeout": 1
             }
         }
